titles.title: Mahou Tsukai Tai! vs Shamanic Princess
シャーマニックプリンセス vs 魔法使いTai!
Shamanic Princess vs Mahou Tsukai Tai!
魔法使いTai! vs シャーマニックプリンセス
샤머닉 프린세스 vs 마법을 쓰고싶어!

anime.description: Mahou Tsukai Tai! vs Shamanic Princess is a short parody epilogue animation produced by Triangle Staff and released by Bandai Visual. It was created as a bonus purchase benefit for those who bought all 12 LDs of "Mahou Tsukai Tai!" and "Shamanic Princess" and sent in their purchase proof.
